title: Sophocles: Oedipus the King
brief_description: An Abridged version of Sophocles’ play performed in the 5th century BC amphitheatre at Amphiaralon by the Athens Classical Theatre Company styled on the ancient models. Narrated by Anthony Quayle, it features James Mason as Oedipus, Claire Bloom as Jocasta and Ian Richardson as Tiresias.
